name: Rock pay-per Caesar
description:
Absolutely awesome and completely original endless runner game with an extra Rock-Paper-Scissors mechanic starring everyone's favorite boulder (who shall remain unnamed for royalties purposes! Yay!)

Run, jump, slide, smash through obstacles, this game has got it all!

Use the arrow keys to move left and right, jump and slide.

Avoid obstacles that do not cover the whole floor.

Use the "Z", "X" and "C" key to smash through obstacles that won't let you pass! Remember, as always, rock beats scissors, scissors beats paper, paper beats rock!

Collect Golden Caesars to be able to purchase awesome new assets!

And never forget to have fun!
